## SystemService.healthCheck() method

Checks and displays the health status of the API. This operation returns an instance of 'ApiStatus' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static healthCheck(): CancelablePromise<ApiStatus>;
```

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ApiStatus](./open-api-client.apistatus.md)<!-- -->&gt;

ApiStatus The request was successful.
